ygData.subject: Re: Fun on Rodcet Nife
ygData.msgSnippet: YES!!!   Come over to the dark side Luke.... sorry, :oD Rodcet is growing by leaps & bounds, it is a great & giving guild, with alot of really nice, sweet*urm*
ygData.messageBody:
YES!!! Come over to the dark side Luke....

sorry, :oD Rodcet is growing by leaps & bounds, it is a great &
giving guild, with alot of really nice, sweet*urm* I mean evil, yeah
that's it Kerid EVIL people *grin* the guild name is Mystic Aliance,
just do a / all & someone will be able to help you join the
guild :o) you might mention this board as well :o)

Ompa




--- In EQ_rainbow@egroups.com, "Swin Piccaver" <swin@s...> wrote:
> Hi and nice to meet you all!
>
> I have just today subscribed to "EQ_Rainbow" on the recomendation
of
> a friend Lora whos been with the list for about a year.
>
> Having recently left Luclin server where me and Lora met each other
> we have started new characters on Terris-Thule. Now we have both
> played EQ for a long while and have had chars on various other
> servers prior to Luclin.... yada yada, I'm babbling.
>
> Anyhow, we have only just started fresh on Terris and Lora
mentioned
> that there are people currently moving to Rodcet Nife starting
again
> also. This has me curious and we are considering it.
>
> Basically I just wanted the name of the guild there and a contact I
> could get in touch with to have a chat with about it all. I'd
> appreciate someone to show us around so to speak.
>
> I can be reached on swin@s... if anyone feels the urge
> to send me some details. =)
>
> Thanks in advance
> Hugs and kisses
> Swin
>
> --- In EQ_rainbow@egroups.com, "David Lari" <kerik@g...> wrote:
> > Not sure if it was mentioned on EQ_Rainbow, but last night we had
a
> big
> > Mystic Alliance guild event on Rodcet Nife. It was called
MegaPlat
> and
> > consisted of a lottery (the grand prize was 665 plat) and raffles
> of various
> > items (armor, jewelry, weapons, etc.)
> >
> > We had around 20 guild members on at the same time and that set a
> record for
> > us, I believe. A lot of people have been moving over to the
Rodcet
> server
> > and this event was a great way for them to get some nice
equipment.
> >
> > Joe and Rob did a great job of coordinating and running the
event.
> Thanks
> > guys.
> >
> > If anyone else wants to create characters on Rodcet, we invite
you
> to come
> > join us. We'll be happy to help you out as you start new
> characters. We're
> > quickly making Rodcet the San Francisco of Norrath and you are
> welcome to
> > join the fun.
> >
> > David
> > Kerik, Wood Elf Druid
